entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Hitman: Blood Money ‚Äî Reprisal
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Full Game UnlockÔºö‚Ç∫699,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫429,00 [‚Ç∫429,00 ~ ‚Ç∫699,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫429,00

In-App Purchases

  • Full Game UnlockÔºö‚Ç∫429,00

Application Description

You are Agent 47 ‚Äî a trained killer caught in the crosshairs of a rival agency, ‚ÄúThe Franchise‚Äù. Embark on an daring mission to take out a shadowy conspiracy‚Äôs lethal architects, and employ every tool at your disposal to get the job done while keeping a low profile. Infiltrate, execute, and escape undetected. Featuring gameplay improvements inspired by later games in the series, Reprisal is an artful redesign of a stealth-action classic ‚Äî complete with a fully customisable touchscreen interface and full gamepad support. EXECUTION IS EVERYTHING Become a master of disguise, ingenuity and improvisation. With multiple ways to approach each objective, Blood Money‚Äôs sandbox missions encourage experimentation, creativity, and repeat playthroughs. THE ULTIMATE PROFESSIONAL Hit hard with an arsenal of upgradable weapons. Perform silent, witness-free kills, or manipulate the environment to engineer tragic ‚Äúaccidents‚Äù. The cleaner the hit, the better the payoff. INTRODUCING INSTINCT MODE The devil is in the details. Inspired by later HITMAN games, Instinct Mode highlights targets, guards and mission-critical points of interest for stealthy kills and quick getaways ‚Äî the hallmarks of a professional assassin. ONE STEP AHEAD An all-new minimap offers situational awareness in real-time, while added alerts warn players when 47 is trespassing or arousing suspicion. COMPLETE CONTROL Tailor the touchscreen controls, connect a gamepad, or utilise full keyboard and mouse support. Whatever your playstyle, complete control is always at your fingertips. We recommend playing Hitman: Blood Money ‚Äî Reprisal on iOS 16 or later. You need 3.9GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues. Supported iPhones: ‚Ä¢ iPhone 8 Plus and later ‚Ä¢ iPhone SE 2 (2020) and later Supported iPads: ‚Ä¢ iPad mini 5 (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad Air 3 (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad 7 (2019) and later ‚Ä¢ iPad Pro 1st gen (2015), 12.9" model only ‚Ä¢ iPad Pro 2nd gen (2017) and later ‚Ä¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com Hitman: Blood Money ¬© 2000-2024 IO Interactive A/S. IO Interactive, IOI, HITMAN are registered trademarks of IO Interactive A/S. Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Day R Premium
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Pile of capsÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Sausepan of capsÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Special packÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Great packÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Small packÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Useful packÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Standart packÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Case with capsÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Survival kitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Money Pro: Personal Finance AR
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • PLUSÔºö‚Ç∫999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫199,99 [‚Ç∫199,99 ~ ‚Ç∫999,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

In-App Purchases

  • PLUSÔºö‚Ç∫199,99
  • GOLDÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99

Application Description

EASY BUDGET. Cut your expenses with Money Pro¬Æ! Expense tracker, budget planner & account manager - all in one app to get your finances under control. Money Pro works great for personal & family expense tracking. Easy sync and iPhone/iPad versions combined in one app. Money Pro is the next generation of the Money app (over 2 million downloads worldwide). FEATURES: Simple and Secure - quick and easy expense/income entries: save your time - password & backups of your data Income and Expense Tracker - split transactions: split one payment into multiple categories, keep it all organized - search by amount, category, description, payee, cheque number, etc - recurring expenses with custom periodicity - calendar for scheduling bills and expenses for the whole year ahead - notifications & alerts for bills due - tracking expenses with family members and cross-platform syncing* (PLUS or GOLD subscription required) - multiple profiles for organized tracking of personal and family finances - attachment of receipt (or any other) photos: keep important bills captured Budget Planner - flexible structure of categories & subcategories with over 1,500 built-in icons - custom periodicity: start your budget from any date - visual indicators for budget spending - transaction list for each category: access your bills with ease - transferring the leftover of the previous budget period to the current one to limit your spending - unique icons with your photos Account Manager - easy management of an unlimited number of accounts - balance change history - additional fields for organizing your records: payee, description, check #, class (personal/business travel expenses). - import of bank statements (files: OFX, CSV) - online banking (GOLD subscription required) Insightful Analytics - eight different reports - filter customization - quick and easy date selection Augmented Reality - build three-dimensional charts right on your table with AR reports (GOLD subscription required) Goals - set your goals and achieve them - visualize your goal progress with a trend chart - four Goal types: Save money, Pay off debt, Reduce expenses, Increase income (GOLD subscription required for last three) More - calculator and currency converter - print and export to PDF, QIF, CSV formats - multiple currencies & automatic update of exchange rates - iCloud sync for iPhone, iPad, Mac (no subscription) - support service & user guide (https://money.pro/guide/) PLUS subscription - 1 Month of PLUS: $4.99 GOLD subscription - 1 Month of GOLD: $9.99 In all the countries (except the USA), actual charges will be converted to the local currency. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Terms & Privacy - http://ibearsoft.com/privacy.html - http://ibearsoft.com/terms.html Money Pro is a Universal app. Pay once and use it on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. *See App Support for further details

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FILCA - SLR Film Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • UPGRADE PROÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • UPGRADE PROÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • FUJI SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • KODAK SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • WEDDING SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • RETRO SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • IU SERIES FILMÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • LOMO SERIESÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • UPGRADE PRO VERSIONÔºö‚Ç∫2.499,99

Application Description

Filca is SLR Film Camera 35 film filters and cinematic effects bring your photos to life. @veteranUser "Without Filca, you're just collecting moments with Filca, you're preserving memories." Master your shots with Filca's expert-level manual controls. ‚ñ† Shutter speed, ISO, white balance control in Manual mode ‚ñ† 35mm film filters from industry leaders like Kodak, Fuji, Agfa Filca is designed to optimize your snapshot experience. It's perfect for taking photos of people, self-portraits, night scenes, and capturing the subtle beauty of everyday life. Apply our filters to achieve an authentic analog film appearance. Main Features: * Auto mode camera with 35mm film filter * Manual mode (Exposure and Focus) * Full control over shutter speed, ISO * Various aspect ratios: 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 1:1 * Digital zoom up to 8x magnification * Manual Focus Control (macro, landscape) * 35mm film filter from Fuji, Kodak, Agfa (including black and white filter) * Film Grain Effect * Film Date Printing Effect * Optical Image Stabilization * Low Power Mode * Selfie Mode * EXIF Data Storage (including location data) * Portrait Enhancements * Full Resolution Photo * Timer and Flash Function * Grid Mode View Pro Features: * White Balance Adjustment Function * Date Print Function Share your photos on Instagram using #filca We look forward to featuring your work. Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/ Terms of Use: https://han.gl/HCCwV Privacy Policy: https://han.gl/Wclkw Let us elevate your photography journey with Filca.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Train Dispatcher!2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫2,99 [‚Ç∫2,99 ~ ‚Ç∫9,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫2,99

Application Description

Drive trains and carry passengers on Japanese railway lines. „ÉªSimple brain game "Train Dispatcher!2" is a brain game with simple rules. No expertise required. Train fans, game fans, everyone can enjoy it. „ÉªTo everyone who will become a train dispatcher In the morning in Japan, customers are waiting for the arrival of the train to go to work. Let's start the train and transport the customers. „ÉªGoal of the game Japanese railway companies are for-profit organizations. Let's aim for high operating profit! „ÉªHow to make profit Fare revenue - Departure cost = Operating profit. Fare revenue is generated when passengers board at a station. Example) If two passengers board a train at a station with a fare of 20, the company receives 40. Departure costs are charged according to the number of cars when the train departs. Example) 30 for a 2-car train, 40 for a 4-car train, and 70 for a 10-car train. One person can ride in one car. Fare revenue is generated when customers board the train. Adjust the driving schedule and the number of vehicles to aim for the highest profit. Departure costs. If you run too many trains and the occupancy rate drops, you'll lose revenue. „ÉªHow to operate The game is very easy to operate and the rules are simple. All you have to do is adjust the number of train cars and make the trains depart at the best time. As the game progresses, various variations such as express trains and transfer stations will appear. „ÉªVolume Enjoy over 50 routes. Please experience the wide variety of transportation strategies of Japanese railway companies. No ads, no charges. „ÉªNo ads, no billing Please concentrate on the game. Children can also enjoy the game. Share your results on Social Media. „ÉªTrain lines you can play with JR East Japan JR Tokai JR West Japan JR Kyushu Tobu Tokyu Seibu Keio Keikyu Keihan Hankyu Hanshin Kintetsu Meitetsu Odakyu Nankai Seitetsu Sotetsu Keisei Tokyo Metro Osaka Metro Toei Subway Tsukuba Express „ÉªCapacity is about 130MB The storage burden is also small. There is no heavy processing at all.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

As long as you have 100% of passion, courage, and‚Ä¶ love for lovely girls~ Rhythm and fight won‚Äôt be an issue [Gameplay] Dance to the music and beat enemies in the air and on the ground. Also, watch out for the obstacles!! What an easy, beginner-friendly rhythm game [Media Review] ÂèØÊÑõ„Çâ„Åó„ÅÑ„Éì„Ç∏„É•„Ç¢„É´„ÅÆ„Ç≠„É£„É©„ÇØ„Çø„Éº„ÅåË∫çÂãï„Åô„Çã„ÄÅÊñ∞ÊÑüË¶ö„ÅÆ2D„Ç¢„ÇØ„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„Çπ„Çø„Ç§„É´„ÅÆ„É™„Ç∫„É†„Ç≤„Éº„É† ‚Äî‚ÄîIGN Japan ‚ÄúA bright exterior hides a surprisingly deep and engaging mash up‚Äù‚Äî‚ÄîPOCKET GAMER Languages Supported: English ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠ÊñáÔºàSimplified ChineseÔºâ ÁπÅ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá ÔºàTraditional ChineseÔºâ Êó•Êú¨Ë™ûÔºàJapanese) Èü©ËØ≠ ÔºàKoreanÔºâ Feedback: https://service.peropero.net/ Twitter:@MuseDash_EN @PeroPeroGuys

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫29,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫29,99

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Inspire Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad ‚Äî Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes. Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery‚Ñ¢ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit colour, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colours on the canvas together to create new ones. Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro. Amazing Brushes ‚Ä¢ 150 high-quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Cont√©, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures ‚Ä¢ All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser ‚Ä¢ Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation The Best Painting App for iPad ‚Ä¢ Sorcery‚Ñ¢, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store ‚Ä¢ Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap ‚Ä¢ Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts ‚Ä¢ Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro ‚Ä¢ Dual-texture brushes ‚Ä¢ 64-bit colour ‚Ä¢ All device orientations are supported all the time ‚Äî switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease ‚Ä¢ 1000 levels of undo and redo are available ‚Ä¢ Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu ‚Ä¢ The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colours from the canvas ‚Ä¢ The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400% Canvas Playback Video Recording ‚Ä¢ Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay ‚Ä¢ You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery ‚Ä¢ Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution Full-Featured Colour Picker ‚Ä¢ Choose any paint colour you can dream of with the intuitive colour picker ‚Ä¢ HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large colour circle, colour square, and opacity slider ‚Ä¢ Your latest colours are saved to a palette automatically while you paint ‚Ä¢ You can also save your favourite colours to a palette with drag and drop Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos and artwork.
